1_17To4zKQntCiVqSZqHK3mwEpbLWVCtLHEe.body: If Zeronet was incorporated into Tribler somehow, then it would solve that issue. Tribler already does a private (Tor-esque) network that uses DHT to find torrents, so I'm sure it wouldn't be a stretch to run Zeronet through Tribler.

> [hexkey](#comment_25_18NsJqjikBYBjwLzMVp7aBJSpqtyRSd9qF): Possible bad idea.

That article is 3 years old now. Tribler has been patched quite a bit since then, and if you check the github you can see that. While I don't know enough about the specifics, I'm sure that, if anything, it at least deserves a more recent review.
